wikipedia_page.main: Naguib Kheraj (born July 1964) is a British banker.

response: The Institute operates under a Board of Governors of which the Aga Khan is chairman.  Afzal Ahmed, Dr. Aziz Esmail, Mohammed Keshavjee, Naguib Kheraj, Zauhar Meghji and Dr. Shafik Sachedina are also sitting members.
* Naguib Kheraj – Vice-Chairman of Barclays Bank PLC; former boss of JP Morgan Cazenove; his philanthropic interests have made him Chairman of the Aga Khan Foundation based in Karachi Pakistan
